title: Car produced in U.S. counted in U.S. GDP

content.prompt: The value of which of the following is counted in the United States gross domestic product?

choices.label: Child care a father provides for his child
An automobile produced in Sweden by a United States firm
A car produced in the United States and sold in Europe
Medical services not provided due to preventative health care

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
